title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: E.D.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and black and green ink; brush and black ink, gouache, green watercolor; graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: In graphite, lower right corner: "E.D."; at upper right corner: "401"
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Square monogram comprised of an "E" with solid black horizontal branches and a black striped vertical element; the "E" surrounds a rectangular-shaped green "D", with a small square of vertical green lines forming the vertical element.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: E.D.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and black and green ink; brush and black ink, gouache, green watercolor; graphite on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-84.
